description: This file defines the main React component for the Home route/page of a smart TV web interface. It includes TV details, connection controls, banner and movie rails, subscription options, and a remote control overlay, with focus management and user interaction logic.

methods.name: img
methods.description: Generates the URL for placeholder thumbnail images based on index.

methods.name: openRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Sets state to show the remote control overlay.

methods.name: closeRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Sets state to hide the remote control overlay.
